metadata.title: CVE-2021-31800 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple path traversal vulnerabilities exist in smbserver.py in Impacketthrough 0.9.22. An attacker that connects to a running smbserver instancecan list and write to arbitrary files via ../ directory traversal. Thiscould potentially be abused to achieve arbitrary code execution byreplacing /etc/shadow or an SSH authorized key.

criterions.comment: impacket package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
